abstract: As the battle over Lions Gate between investor Carl C. Icahn and the company’s management nears a showdown over a poison-pill vote, it looks like the entertainment company has the lion’s share of shareholder support, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: As the battle over Lions Gate between investor Carl C. Icahn and the company’s management nears a showdown over a poison-pill vote, it looks like the entertainment company has the lion’s share of shareholder support, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The bitter battle over Lions Gate Entertainment, which has pitted the  investor Carl C. Icahn against the company’s management, is nearing a showdown over a poison-pill vote. So far, it looks like the company has the support of a majority of its shareholders.

headline.main: Lions Gate Said to Have Votes for Poison Pill
